text: LONDON British finance minister Rishi Sunak said on Friday that data showing a 2.9% drop in economic output during January showed how COVID-19 continued to affect the economy.Todays figures highlight the impact the pandemic continued to have on our economy at the start of the year as we tackled the new variant of the virus - and I know this is a cause of concern for many, Sunak said in a statement.He added that the vaccine rollout and his budget announced last week were reasons to be hopeful.
